exampleEn: With dedication, you can achieve your goal of becoming a manager.
exampleKo: 헌신한다면 매니저가 되려는 당신의 목표를 달성할 수 있습니다.

exampleEn: He worked as an apprentice to learn the trade.
exampleKo: 그는 그 일을 배우기 위해 견습생으로 일했습니다.

exampleEn: All staff members are required to dress formally for the event.
exampleKo: 모든 직원은 행사를 위해 정장을 입어야 합니다.

exampleEn: The CEO arrived, dressed in a sharp suit.
We need to figure out why sales dropped last month.
exampleKo: 우리는 지난달 매출이 왜 떨어졌는지 알아내야 합니다.

exampleEn: She is seeking full-time work in the marketing sector.
exampleKo: 그녀는 마케팅 분야에서 정규직 일자리를 찾고 있습니다.

exampleEn: This position offers an excellent job opportunity for graduates.
exampleKo: 이 직책은 졸업생들에게 훌륭한 취업 기회를 제공합니다.

exampleEn: His job search lasted for three months before he was hired.
exampleKo: 그의 구직 활동은 고용되기 전 3개월 동안 지속되었습니다.

exampleEn: As a job seeker, you should network as much as possible.
exampleKo: 구직자로서, 당신은 가능한 한 많이 인맥을 쌓아야 합니다.

exampleEn: Please lay out the tools on the table.
Can you write a letter of recommendation for me?
exampleKo: 저를 위해 추천서를 써 주실 수 있나요?

exampleEn: Employees will receive a 5% pay raise this year.
exampleKo: 직원들은 올해 5%의 임금 인상을 받을 것입니다.

exampleEn: Practical experience is just as important as academic qualifications.
Please provide proof of employment from your previous company.
exampleKo: 이전 회사의 재직 증명서를 제출해 주세요.

exampleEn: If rejected, you can reapply after six months.
exampleKo: 거절당할 경우, 6개월 후에 재지원할 수 있습니다.

exampleEn: A recommendation letter is required for this application.
Please attach a reference letter to your resume.
The package was sent off to the headquarters yesterday.
The recruiter called to set up an interview.
exampleKo: 채용 담당자가 면접 일정을 잡기 위해 전화했습니다.

exampleEn: All applicants must take an examination.
New employees are sent to the training center for a week.
exampleKo: 신입 사원들은 일주일 동안 훈련소로 보내집니다.

exampleEn: Please have a seat in the waiting room.
He is a well-educated professional with two degrees.
exampleKo: 그는 두 개의 학위를 가진 잘 교육받은 전문가입니다.

exampleEn: Keep your workstation clean and organized.
She is a zealous worker who always exceeds expectations.
exampleKo: 그녀는 항상 기대를 뛰어넘는 열성적인 직원입니다.

exampleEn: Submit your cover letter along with your CV.
He is devoted to his work and rarely takes time off.
exampleKo: 그는 자신의 일에 헌신적이며 좀처럼 휴가를 내지 않습니다.

exampleEn: We are looking for an energetic salesperson.
exampleKo: 우리는 활동적인 영업 사원을 찾고 있습니다.

exampleEn: The team is enthusiastic about the new project.
She excels in customer service.
The price excludes shipping costs.
He speaks Spanish fluently.
I'm not sure if I can get through the final exam.
exampleKo: 기말 시험에 합격할 수 있을지 확신이 서지 않습니다.

exampleEn: This candidate matches our requirements perfectly.
exampleKo: 이 후보자는 우리의 요구 사항과 완벽하게 일치합니다.

exampleEn: A car is a necessity in this city.
What qualifications do you have for this role?
exampleKo: 이 역할에 대해 어떤 자격을 갖추고 있습니까?

exampleEn: Please include all relevant experience in your application.
exampleKo: 지원서에 모든 관련 경험을 포함시켜 주세요.

exampleEn: Employees can sign up for the workshop online.
exampleKo: 직원들은 온라인으로 워크숍에 등록할 수 있습니다.

exampleEn: We hired a talented graphic designer.
He is a visiting professor at the university.
The company has a diverse workforce.
exampleKo: 그 회사는 다양한 인력을 보유하고 있습니다.

exampleEn: The CEO will address the audience at the conference.
Decisions should not be influenced by appearance.
exampleKo: 결정은 외모에 영향을 받아서는 안 됩니다.

exampleEn: We are seeking a bilingual secretary who speaks English and Japanese.
exampleKo: 우리는 영어와 일본어를 구사하는 2개 국어 비서를 찾고 있습니다.

exampleEn: Please send your curriculum vitae to the HR department.
He received his diploma in engineering.
Marathon runners need great physical endurance.
exampleKo: 마라톤 주자들은 엄청난 신체적 인내력을 필요로 합니다.

exampleEn: Fluency in English is essential for this job.
She is fluent in three languages.
I decided to go with your suggestion.
The human resources department handles hiring.
The machine was operating improperly.
Always respond to customers in a positive manner.
He is an expert in the field of artificial intelligence.
His inexperience led to some mistakes.
exampleKo: 그의 미숙함이 몇 가지 실수로 이어졌습니다.

exampleEn: She seems to lack confidence in her abilities.
exampleKo: 그녀는 자신의 능력에 자신감이 부족해 보입니다.

exampleEn: Make checking your email a regular habit.
exampleKo: 이메일을 확인하는 것을 규칙적인 습관으로 만드세요.

exampleEn: We want to make a commitment to sustainability.
I make a point of arriving early.
We need more manpower to finish the project.
exampleKo: 프로젝트를 끝내려면 더 많은 인력이 필요합니다.

exampleEn: She earned a master's degree in business administration.
He is a novice at programming.
Employees receive their paycheck every two weeks.
Self-motivation is key to working from home.
The system will send a notification when the task is done.
exampleKo: 작업이 완료되면 시스템이 알림을 보낼 것입니다.

exampleEn: There is a vacancy in the sales department.
Help wanted: Experienced chef.
The interviewer asked about my work history.
exampleKo: 면접관은 나의 경력 사항에 대해 물었습니다.
